awards.text: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 2 wins & 5 nominations.

fullplot: Still craving for the love of his life, Ted Striker follows Elaine onto the flight that she is working on as a member of the cabin crew. Elaine doesn't want to be with Ted anymore, but when the crew and passengers fall ill from food poisoning, all eyes are on Ted.
plot: A man afraid to fly must ensure that a plane lands safely after the pilots become sick.
title: Airplane!

tomatoes.consensus: Though unabashedly juvenile and silly, Airplane! is nevertheless an uproarious spoof comedy full of quotable lines and slapstick gags that endure to this day.

writers: Jim Abrahams (written for the screen by)
David Zucker (written for the screen by)
Jerry Zucker (written for the screen by)
